properties.name: Hollygrove Growers Market and Farm
properties.description: Posted by Subsistresist 8301 Olive St, New Orleans, LAHollygrove Market is central to the DIY/local food scene in New Orleans. They are currently open saturdays from 10 to 2, selling CSA style produce boxes for 5, plus a variety of other local produce, eggs, dairy and even a small selection of meats. The market is surrounded by food producing gardens, and even a chicken coop! I suspect this place will really blossom in the next few years.

properties.name: Whole Foods
properties.description: Posted by Subsistresist 3135 Esplanade Ave New Orleans, LA 70119The overpriced yuppie food store we all love to hate and hate to love. They do have by far the largest selection of organics, but I wouldn\'t trust \'em farther than I can throw \'em. Too shiny and pretty and perfectly engineered to appeal to- gulp, oh god- me!
